statements: ALTER TABLE `system_infos` CHANGE `dbversion` `dbversion` VARCHAR(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `exchangerates` CHANGE `currency_code` `currency_code` VARCHAR(10) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `exchangerates` CHANGE `currency_desc` `currency_desc` VARCHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `system_infos` ADD `process_update` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `userid_updating`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_overall` ADD `xch_blockheight` INT NOT NULL AFTER `netspace`;
ALTER TABLE `system_infos` ADD `lastcronrun` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT '1970-01-01 23:00:00' AFTER `maintenance_mode`;
ALTER TABLE `users_settings` ADD `totp_enable` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `gui_mode`, ADD `totp_secret` VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL AFTER `totp_enable`;
ALTER TABLE `users_settings` ADD `totp_proofen` TINYINT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `totp_secret`;
ALTER TABLE `users_settings` CHANGE `totp_secret` `totp_secret` VARCHAR(150) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `users_sessions` ADD `totpmobilepassed` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `authkeypassed`;

system_infos: ALTER TABLE `chia_wallets` CHANGE `syncstatus` `syncstatus` TINYINT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_wallets` CHANGE `wallettype` `wallettype` TINYINT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_wallets` CHANGE `totalbalance` `totalbalance` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_wallets` CHANGE `pendingtotalbalance` `pendingtotalbalance` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_wallets` CHANGE `spendable` `spendable` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm` CHANGE `farming_status` `syncstatus` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` CHANGE `hash` `challenge_hash` VARCHAR(66) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` CHANGE `hash_index` `signage_point_index` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `proofcount` INT NOT NULL AFTER `proofs`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `challenge_chain_sp` VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL AFTER `proofs`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `difficulty` INT NOT NULL AFTER `challenge_hash`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `sub_slot_iters` INT NOT NULL AFTER `signage_point_index`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `reward_chain_sp` VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL AFTER `difficulty`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_plots_directories` DROP `devname`, DROP `finalplotsdir`, DROP `totalsize`, DROP `totalused`, DROP `totalusedpercent`;

CREATE TABLE `chia_infra_sysinfo_filesystems` (`id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`sysinfo_id` int NOT NULL,`device` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL,`size` int NOT NULL,`used` int NOT NULL,`avail` int NOT NULL,`mountpoint` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`id`),KEY `sysinfo_id` (`sysinfo_id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=43647 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_general_ci;
ALTER TABLE `chia_farm_challenges` ADD `nodeid` INT NOT NULL AFTER `id`, ADD INDEX `nodeid` (`nodeid`);
ALTER TABLE `chia_plots_directories` ADD `firstreported` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `plotcount`, ADD `lastupdated` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `firstreported`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_plots` DROP `finalmountid`, DROP `k_size`, DROP `plotcreationdate`, DROP `plot_key`, DROP `pool_key`, DROP `filename`,DROP `status`;

ALTER TABLE `chia_plots` ADD `file_size` INT NOT NULL AFTER `nodeid`, ADD `filename` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL AFTER `file_size`, ADD `plot_seed` VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL AFTER `filename`, ADD `plot_id` VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL AFTER `plot_seed`, ADD `plot_public_key` VARCHAR(98) NOT NULL AFTER `plot_id`, ADD `pool_contract_puzzle_hash` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL AFTER `plot_public_key`, ADD `pool_public_key` VARCHAR(100) NULL AFTER `pool_contract_puzzle_hash`, ADD `size` INT NOT NULL AFTER `pool_public_key`, ADD `time_modified` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `size`, ADD `last_reported` DATETIME NOT NULL AFTER `time_modified`;
ALTER TABLE `chia_plots` CHANGE `nodeid` `cpd_id` INT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `chia_plots` CHANGE `file_size` `file_size` BIGINT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `nodes_status` CHANGE `querytime` `firstreported` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
ALTER TABLE `nodes_status` ADD `lastreported` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER `firstreported`;

CREATE TABLE `nodes_services_status` (`id` int NOT NULL, `nodeid` int NOT NULL, `farmer_service` tinyint NOT NULL, `wallet_service` tinyint NOT NULL, `harvester_service` tinyint NOT NULL, `firstreported` datetime NOT NULL, `lastreported` datetime NOT NULL, KEY `lastreported` (`lastreported`))
ALTER TABLE `nodes_services_status` CHANGE `farmer_service` `serviceid` TINYINT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `nodes_services_status` ADD `servicestate` TINYINT NOT NULL AFTER `serviceid`;
ALTER TABLE `nodes_services_status` CHANGE `id` `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT;
